titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is written from Bombay. Stannus explains the circumstances surrounding a bill for repairs to the Residency, to which an objection had been raised by the Auditor General. He hopes to be relieved of the charge, and refers to previous correspondence with the Bombay Government.Enclosed with this letter is:General Department letter no 4 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to James Farish, Secretary to Government, dated 25 May 1824, requesting a further supply of cash to enable him to complete alterations to the Residency and explaining why the costs of building had been higher than the original estimate of the committee.
